programme.title: De Corao Partido, (1970, Entertainment)

programme.title: Triangle, (1970, Entertainment)

programme.title: Acorrentada, (1970, Entertainment)

programme.title: Departamento Q - Guardies das Causas Perdidas, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: O detetive Carl foi transferido para outro departamento para organizar casos encerrados. Ele se sente rebaixado, mas com a ajuda de sua assistente, no vai demorar a voltar ao e reabrir o caso de uma mulher que supostamente se suicidou.

programme.title: Departamento Q: O Ausente, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Vinte anos depois do assassinato de jovens gmeos, o caso acaba na mesa de Carls Morck e ele logo percebe que algo est terrivelmente errado. Na poca, o caso havia sido encerrado com a condenao de um forasteiro.

programme.title: Festival Sangrento, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Fs de terror vo a um festival celebrando os clssicos do gnero, apenas para descobrir que o carismtico artista por trs do evento tem intenes diablicas.

programme.title: Histria de um Assassinato, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Atriz de sucesso se debate durante um pesadelo em que luta, atira e mata seu ex-namorado traficante. Ao acordar, ela descobre que o assassinato realmente ocorreu no dia anterior e que Sal, morto, est em um ba em sua sala de estar.

programme.title: Ningum Brinca com Jesus Quintana, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Jesus um cara excntrico que acaba de sair da priso e se une a um velho amigo para uma nova empreitada de roubos e aventuras. No caminho, a descontrada Marie forma um tringulo amoroso com a dupla.

programme.title: Deus da Guerra, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Durante o sculo 16, piratas japoneses dominaram a costa chinesa, saqueando as pequenas cidades e aterrorizando os cidados. Quando o Comandante Yu recruta a ajuda de um forte e jovem general, eles elaboram um plano para derrotar os invasores.

programme.title: Jacob's Cross, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Jacob indicado ao cargo de CEO e seu amigo Prospero o encoraja a agarrar a oportunidade. Mas sua me o aconselha a se manter afastado da famlia Aboyami.

programme.title: Beyblade Burst
programme.desc: Depois de uma emocionante aventura na selva mexicana, Valt retorna para casa em BC Sol. A tenso aumenta quando um amigo talentoso aparece para se juntar equipe.

programme.title: Beyblade Burst
programme.desc: H emoo no ar quando o astro de cinema Joshua Burns aparece na cidade para filmar seu novo filme de ao. Valt, Audaz e Cuza so escolhidos como os Space Ninjas, os arquiinimigos Blader do heri.
programme.sub-title: Joshua Contra os Ninjas do Espao!

programme.title: Beyblade Burst
programme.desc: Luzes, cmera, ao! Valt, Rantaro e Cuza aprenderam suas falas, praticaram seus papis e se destacaram mas ser que conseguiro derrotar Joshua Burns?

programme.title: Beyblade Burst
programme.desc: BC Sol est procura de um novo treinador. Ao encontrar um velho veterano, a equipe o convida para completar um perodo de experincia. Embora a equipe esteja entusiasmada, Kris tem algumas reservas sobre a potencial nova contratao.
programme.sub-title: Arena Infinita! O Desafio de Raul!

programme.title: Beyblade Burst
programme.desc: Com a Liga Mundial chegando, os Clubes esto finalizando os preparativos para o grande evento. Depois de ingressar nos Raging Bulls, Joshua aproveita a oportunidade de se aproximar de seu heri, Free.

programme.title: Beyblade Burst
programme.desc: Valt recebe uma carta inesperada de Xander. Acontece que seu velho amigo se mudou para o Brasil para ingressar no renomado SB Rios. Mas para provar que merece um lugar na equipe, o gigante sorridente deve passar no teste dos 100 Bladers!

programme.title: Beyblade Burst
programme.desc: BC Sol enfrenta o Royals, em revanche digna de um rei. Desta vez, Valt deve ter certeza de que est preparado. Com a ajuda de Rickson e Raul, ele no descansar at aperfeioar seu novo movimento.

programme.title: Beyblade Burst
programme.desc: Como bom estar em casa! O retorno de Valt traz algumas recompensas: rever os amigos, reunir-se com a famlia e comer po Bey caseiro.

programme.title: Beyblade Burst
programme.desc: Emergindo das sombras, um misterioso novo blader faz sua apario no palco da Liga Mundial. Conseguir Cuza descobrir as verdadeiras intenes deste espectro com presas?

programme.title: Beyblade Burst
programme.desc: Val e suas amigas viajam ao Brasil para o charmoso e animado Carnaval de Bey. Nem tudo corre conforme o planejado, pois os meninos acabam em apuros. Dessa vez, ser necessrio muito mais do que uma atitude positiva para tirar o BC Sol do buraco.

programme.title: Beyblade Burst
programme.desc: No h reservas neste confronto de fortes impactos, voos rpidos e metal retorcido, entre BC Sol e SB Rios. A Liga Mundial agora tem os candidatos s semifinais e cada equipe est mais forte do que nunca.
programme.sub-title: Rota de Impacto! Para as finais!

programme.title: Beyblade Burst
programme.desc: Nada pode extinguir as chamas destas batalhas ardentes! Com tanta coisa em risco, Valt e seus amigos devem usar todos os seus talentos para tentarem se redimir. Enquanto isso, Raging Bulls e AS Gallus lutam em um confronto pico e equilibrado.

programme.title: Beyblade Burst
programme.desc: As demais equipes do torneio da Liga Mundial esto cada vez mais perto de garantir uma vaga na partida final. Valt tem uma oportunidade de ouro para se testar contra seu velho amigo Xander.

programme.title: Beyblade Burst
programme.desc: A final da Liga Mundial est aqui! O evento glamoroso d as boas-vindas a todas as estrelas, antigos rivais e ex-companheiros de equipe, e Valt no gostaria que fosse de outra forma.

programme.title: Beyblade Burst
programme.desc: O confronto pico entre os competidores finais continua, e nem mesmo um mdium poderia adivinhar o que vem a seguir. Esses Bladers so os melhores em sua classe, e ambas as equipes esto lado a lado.

programme.title: Beyblade Burst
programme.desc: A Final da Liga Mundial continua e se h uma coisa certa que nunca houve um confronto como este. Todo o trabalho do BC Sol leva at este momento decisivo. Quem ter a tenacidade de estar altura da situao e conquistar a coroa?

programme.title: Beyblade Burst
programme.desc: Depois de aceitar o que parecia ser um desafio impossvel, Red Eye retorna para reivindicar seu lugar como o Blader mais poderoso. Ele no permitir que ningum atrapalhe sua busca por poder e destruio.

programme.title: Beyblade Burst
programme.desc: Ao saber de um segredo perturbador, Valt decide concentrar toda a sua energia no treinamento. Ele no vai parar por nada at melhorar, independente do passado.

programme.title: Beyblade Burst
programme.desc: Que comece a festa de boas-vindas! Um velho amigo retorna ao BC Sol, fazendo com que velhos ressentimentos venham tona. Ser ele aceito de braos abertos pelos antigos colegas ou ter que lutar para reconquistar a confiana deles?

programme.title: Beyblade Burst
programme.desc: A Bladers International Cup est prestes a comear. Infelizmente, Valt e Kit acabam perdidos em uma arena subterrnea realmente sombria.

programme.title: Beyblade Burst
programme.desc: Ningum se mexa, porque o torneio est pegando fogo! A Bladers International Cup comeou oficialmente e nada parecido foi visto.

programme.title: Beyblade Burst
programme.desc: Aunque parece que todo Blader en el mundo quiere derrotarlo, Ojo Rojo contina arrasando en el torneo. Al menos, hasta que el antiguo pupilo del Snake Pit, Norman, tenga oportunidad de enfrentarlo.

programme.title: Beyblade Burst
programme.desc: Este campeonato coloca rivais contra rivais, inimigos contra inimigos e amigos contra amigos.

programme.title: Beyblade Burst
programme.desc: O Imperador subiu superfcie, a Estrela caiu do cu e as Serpentes do Poo das Cobras esto soltas! Bladers de todos os tipos e tamanhos se enfrentam para determinar quem o melhor de todos.

programme.title: Beyblade Burst
programme.desc: A classificao no favorece o BC Sol. Ser necessrio um grande impulso de confiana para estes Bladers recuperarem o seu melhor nvel.

programme.title: Beyblade Burst
programme.desc: Entre todos os competidores da International Bladers Cup, sempre houve um na frente do peloto, e Valt est se preparando para enfrent-lo.

programme.title: Beyblade Burst
programme.desc: Quando Valt derrotado em sua ltima partida, sua nica esperana encontrar inspirao para fortalec-lo. Felizmente, Free de la Hoya pode ser quem pode ajud-lo.

programme.title: Beyblade Burst
programme.desc: Os competidores lutam com unhas e dentes para garantir uma vaga na prxima rodada.

programme.title: Beyblade Burst
programme.desc: O Imperador reinou por muito tempo. Muitos Bladers desafiaram Kurt, com a vitria em mente, mas todos falharam em alcan-la.
programme.sub-title: Trabalho em equipe! Para as semifinais!

programme.title: Beyblade Burst
programme.desc: Com o cenrio preparado para as meias-finais, os restantes candidatos so simplesmente excepcionais. O caminho para o topo requer fora bruta, estratgias brilhantes e perseverana sem fim.

programme.title: Beyblade Burst
programme.desc: Ningum poderia imaginar o quo intenso esse torneio seria. Free est mostrando um lado completamente diferente, Shu est redefinindo o significado da palavra destruio.

programme.title: Beyblade Burst
programme.desc: o que todos estvamos esperando. A oportunidade de ganhar o ttulo, deixar o mundo orgulhoso e reconquistar um amigo para toda a vida. Quer Valt consiga a vitria ou no, ele e Valtryek faro a nica coisa pela qual vieram: Let it Rip.

programme.title: Beyblade Burst
programme.desc: Depois de dois anos como Campeo Mundial, Valt est pronto para levar Valtryek ao prximo nvel; Super Z Turbo! Em sua jornada, Valt conhece Aiger Akabane.

programme.title: Beyblade Burst
programme.desc: Determinado a ficar mais forte e lutar contra os melhores, Aiger se transfere para a Academia Beigoma. Seu objetivo lutar contra o sucessor de Valt, Fubuki Sumiye.

programme.title: Beyblade Burst
programme.desc: A partida entre Aiger e Fubuki continua. Aiger descobre que no o nico irmo Akabane na Academia Beigoma quando descobre que sua irm mais nova, Naru, tambm est se transferindo!

programme.title: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: Beyblade Burst

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: A vitria de Raimon prova ter uma vida muito curta, pois apenas alguns minutos aps a vitria o cu cai. De repente, a terra invadida por aliengenas.

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: O Raimon Eleven se adiantou para tentar salvar o mundo contra os jogadores de futebol da Academia Aliea, mas como jogar uma formiga contra um elefante.

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: O primeiro-ministro foi sequestrado por aliengenas, e Endou e os outros esto determinados a ajud-lo. A Caravana Inazuma viaja para o parque onde foi sequestrado, pronto para derrotar os aliengenas.

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: O Raimon Eleven nunca desiste, e eles vo tentar novamente contra a Aliea Academy. Eles vo cara a cara, mas a Academia Aliea muito poderosa.

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: A notcia de que Gouenji expulso da equipe no vai bem com a maioria dos Raimon Eleven, especialmente Someoka.

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: Raimon finalmente chega a Hakuren, mas o que os choca que ... eles veem a mesma pessoa que viram da ltima vez, e foi revelado que era Fubuki Shirou.
programme.sub-title: O Prncipe da Terra da Neve

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: Fubuki oficialmente parte do Raimon Eleven. Mostrando a seus colegas de equipe uma nova maneira de praticar, talvez Fubuki possa traz-los para um novo nvel e reunir a equipe.
programme.sub-title: Quem o novo atacante do Ace

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: O Raimon subiu de nvel durante o treinamento de snowboard e est pronto para enfrentar a Aliea Academy mais uma vez. Mas eles tm o que preciso para venc-los? E mesmo se o fizerem, o que mais a Aliea Academy tem reservado.

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: Quando todos pensavam que a Terra havia sido salva, a Academia Aliea atacou mais uma vez, desta vez com Epsilon. Essas caras realmente querem dizer negcios e vo bater em Manyuuji em Kyto.

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: Aps a derrota esmagadora do Manyuuji Junior High, Raimon se prepara para enfrent-los, com Kogure Yuuya ajudando no pedido de Otonashi Haruna. Os resultados so estranhos e desanimadores, mas tambm encorajadores.

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: Raimon tem um novo membro, Kogure, que faz brincadeiras com eles o tempo todo. Ainda assim, eles precisaro de toda a ajuda possvel.

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: Raimon est preso no meio de um jogo contra a True Teikoku Academy, e Kageyama convenceu seus jogadores a usarem todos os meios para vencer; mesmo que isso signifique a destruio de suas mentes e corpos.

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: Raimon finalmente chega em casa para recarregar as baterias e treinar muito mais. Eles descobrem que todo mundo est treinando para ajud-los, incluindo alguns antigos oponentes.

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: Assim que chegam em casa, e Raimon esto de volta estrada novamente - desta vez eles esto indo para akasaka, onde h rumores de que a Aliea Academy tem uma base.

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: Raimon acha que o centro de treinamento secreto do CCC sob o parque de diverses um timo lugar para se treinar, mas de onde veio.

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: O grande jogo contra Epsilon est aqui, e Raimon sai com toda a fora! Eles sero capazes de lutar contra os aliengenas.
programme.sub-title: Epsilon A batalha mais difcil ainda

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: Notcias inesperadas sobre outro caderno de Daisuke envia Raimon para Fukuoka, onde eles encontram um dos velhos amigos de Daisuke e algum que pode se tornar o aprendiz de Endou.

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: O jogo de exibio entre Raimon e Yokato Junior High um caso difcil. Endou e Tachimukai esto exibindo seus goleiros.

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: Hiroto, que na verdade Gran, capito do The Genesis - desafia Raimon para um jogo. Ele rapidamente se transforma em uma partida unilateral, j que o Genesis continua marcando e nenhum dos Raimon Eleven consegue acompanhar seus movimentos.

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: A deciso de Kazemaru de deixar o time deixou Endou arrasado e tirou sua vontade de praticar. Nada que algum diga parece ter um efeito nele.

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: As notcias sobre a existncia de um atacante de chamas mandam Raimon para Okinawa, esperando que seja Gouenji Shuuya. Mas que coisas inesperadas podem acontecer ao longo do caminho.
programme.sub-title: A grande batalha no mar do sul

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: Logo aps chegar a Okinawa, Raimon inicia a busca pelo atacante. Enquanto procuram, Fubuki e Domon encontram um jogador que afirma ser o atacante.

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: O tsunami revela a Raimon que ele se juntou ao clube de futebol da escola e eles querem brincar com eles. Raimon vai para o Oumihara Junior High, e o jogo comea.
programme.sub-title: O jogo de futebol rtmico radical

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: O jogo entre Raimon e Oumihara continua, sem nenhuma das equipes se afastando. No final, Raimon vence, mas uma vitria estreita.

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: O Epsilon se tornou o Epsilon Remastered e desafia Raimon para a batalha. Mas no so apenas eles que esto nivelados, Raimon tambm. Mas eles ainda no conseguem romper as tcnicas de Desarm, nem mesmo Fubuki.

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: A partida entre Raimon e Epsilon Remastered continua sua segunda metade. Embora eles tentem o seu melhor, Desarm muito rpido e poderoso para eles.

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: O retorno de Gouenji, juntamente com a vitria contra o Epsilon Remastered, elevaram o esprito de Raimon. Eles decidem voltar para casa para descansar. Mas assim que eles voltam, Diamond Dust quer que Raimon os enfrente em um jogo.
programme.sub-title: A escurido congelante da poeira de diamante

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: Algum inesperado est aqui para se juntar a Raimon no meio da partida - Aphrodi! O rival de Raimon veio se juntar e lutar ao lado deles.

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: O tcnico Hitomiko decide remover Endou como goleiro e pede que ele se torne um libero. Depois disso, Aphrodi se tornar um atacante e Tachimukai se tornar o novo goleiro de Raimon.

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: O Raimon Eleven chega a Teikoku para treinamento, conforme solicitado por Kidou. Kidou tambm pede que seus ex-colegas de equipe - o time Teikoku jogue um amistoso contra o Raimon com Endou, Kidou e Domon do lado de Teikoku.

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: Prominence e Diamond Dust se combinaram para se tornar a equipe mais forte do universo - The Chaos - e desafiam Raimon para um jogo. Este o primeiro jogo que Raimon joga em sua nova formao.

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: Graas a Otomura, Kidou descobre como parar o ritmo do Caos. O fluxo do jogo totalmente revertido, pois Raimon continua marcando sem parar.

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: Raimon exige que o treinador Hitomiko explique por que Gran a chamou de irm, entre outras coisas. Ela promete explicar tudo depois que eles chegarem ao Monte Fuji.

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: Quando Raimon entra na Academia Aliea, sua verdade chocante revelada: a Academia Aliea so crianas humanas cujas habilidades foram aprimoradas pelo meteorito Aliea.

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: A primeira metade da partida de Raimon contra o The Genesis comeou. No entanto, ainda h mais um problema na equipe, e esse problema s pode ser respondido pela pessoa com um problema, Fubuki Shirou.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Influenciado por Ishisaki, Hyuga tenta marcar Wakabayashi sem sucesso. Sawada mostra a ele o motivo, e o estilo de jogo dos Meiwa muda radicalmente.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Agora que o time dos Meiwa voltou vida, Hyuga empata com a ajuda de Takeshi Sawada e, minutos antes de acabar o jogo, marca vantagem.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Na prorrogao, os dois times esto esgotados. A defesa decidir a partida com um duelo entre os goleiros Nankaatsu Wakabayashi e Meiwa Wakashimazu.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: A final do torneio nacional est prestes a terminar. O plano de Wakabayashi de se defender para deixar Tsubasa e Misaki descansarem valeu a pena.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Nankatsu o campeo do torneio nacional, e seu capito, Tsubasa Ozora, levanta a bandeira com orgulho e alegria como sinal de vitria.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Shun Nitta, ex-jogador do time de Nankatsu, desafia Tsubasa. Nitta impressiona Tsubasa com sua agilidade e o pressiona com seu famoso chute de falco.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Nas finais, o time de Otomo mantm a escola de Nankatsu afastada com seu novo jogador Shun Nitta, mas ele percebe que no pode derrotar Tsubasa.
programme.sub-title: A caminho do grande torneio. O tiro do falco

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Shun Nitta no consegue concluir seu chute de falco sem que a bola bata no cho. Depois de vrias tentativas, finalmente aperfeioa seu chute.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Toho enfrenta o Musashi. Hyuga marca trs gols, forando Misugi a comparecer na quadra antes do previsto. Misugi tem apenas 30 minutos para reagir.
programme.sub-title: Spella r Atsuba, Hyuga vs Too Much

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Ainda estamos na final das eliminatrias em Tquio, e o capito de Musashi usa toda a sua fora para empatar, apesar do problema no corao.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Tsubasa recebe uma mensagem de um amigo, Genzo Wakabayashi. Tsubasa pergunta o motivo da ligao e diz que encontrou um jogador mais forte que ele.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Aps um pesado treinamento na ilha de Okinawa, Hyuga se livra de sua compaixo, mas quando volta para seus companheiros, se depara com novo obstculo.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Nankatsu empata o placar no segundo tempo graas a Takasugi. Tsubasa marcar mais um gol, ou ser que Azumaichi conseguir domar Nankatsu?

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: A partida entre Nankatsu e Hanawa comea e Tsubasa enfrenta os irmos Tachibana, que agora mostraro um novo chute especial para derrotar Nankatsu.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Tsubasa ferido tentando defender o gol. Os irmos Tachibana aproveitam e marcam o gol do empate. Tsubasa poder retornar antes do final da partida?

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Faltam alguns minutos para o fim, e o time de Nankatsu no consegue se aproximar da pequena rea. Os irmos Tachibana tentaro uma nova estratgia.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Estamos nas quartas de final do torneio nacional: Furano contra Minami-iwa. Matsuyama e seu time no conseguem neutralizar o ataque dos oponentes.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Nankatsu joga contra Hirado. O vencedor avanar para as semifinais. Tsubasa deve enfrentar o poderoso Hiroshi Jito, capito e zagueiro do time.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Depois de uma desvantagem esmagadora, proporcionada pela dupla Hirado, Tsubasa decide arriscar e tenta dar o famoso chute com o efeito de Roberto.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Nas semifinais, o primeiro a jogar o Meiwa contra Toho. Sem Hyuga na quadra, Meiwa tira vantagem de Toho, enquanto Hyuga assite o jogo do banco.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: No ltimo jogo das semifinais, Nankatsu enfrenta Furano e seu capito, Hikaru Matsuyama, vestindo o nmero dez como Tsubasa. Quem ir para a final?

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Furano empata na segunda metade da partida. Os ferimentos de Tsubasa esto piorando, mas ele tenta chutar mais uma vez. Matsuyama tenta impedi-lo.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Na final do torneio, Tsubasa espera se recuperar de sua leso para jogar contra Toho. Hyuga decide pedir ao treinador Kitazune que o deixe jogar.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Estamos nos primeiros cinco minutos do jogo entre Nankatsu e Toho, e a tenso na quadra pode ser cortada com uma faca.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Apesar da disciplina de Nankatsu, Toho domina com dois gols de diferena graas ao seu capito, Kojiro Hyuga, e ao seu poderoso chute de tigre.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Apesar da recomendao mdica, Tsubasa quer continuar na quadra. Ishizaki e os outros tentam defender o gol. Hyuga usa seu famoso chute de tigre.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Nankatsu e Toho tm trs gols cada. No calor da partida, Takasugi de Nankatsu comete uma falta, dando a Hyuga um chute livre. Ele marcar um gol?

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Se empatarem na prorrogao, os dois times sero campees, mas Tsubasa e Hyuga no querem dividir o ttulo. Este o ltimo jogo de Tsubasa no Japo.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Hyuga e Tsubasa esto mostrando seu talento, e os chutes so dignos desta final. Todos sabem que, no fundo, um duelo pessoal. Quem ser o campeo?

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Tsubasa Ozora, um apaixonado por futebol, conhece Ryo Ishizaki, que disputa com o goleiro Genzo Wakabayashi o direito de usar o campo.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Tsubasa consegue marcar um gol para Genzo e perde o desafio. Enfurecido, exige revanche e o desafia, mas em uma partida oficial do Torneio Escolar.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Roberto convida o time de Nishigaoka para uma partida de treinamento que lhe permita analisar as fraquezas do time de Nankatsu e ajud-los a melhorar
programme.sub-title: A nova e aprimorada equipe de Nankatsu

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: Tsubasa est feliz por ter Roberto como hspede; porm, Roberto esconde um problema, e o verdadeiro motivo da sua viagem para o Japo descoberto.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa
programme.desc: O torneio comea, e o time de Nankatsu continua seu treinamento, espionando um jogo particular do time de Shutetsu para analisar seu estilo de jogo.

programme.title: Vivendo e Morrendo, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Aps um assalto, quatro ladres se encontram em um tiroteio com a polcia. Um morto e um ferido, o trio restante se refugia em um pub britnico.

programme.title: Projeto Pandora, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: Um agente da CIA precisa deter um ex-associado que roubou uma arma que mata pessoas sem danificar prdios, tudo isso antes de ele se casar em poucos dias.

programme.title: Victor, (2021, Drama)
programme.desc: Baseado em uma histria verdica, um adolescente migrante de Porto Rico forado a sobreviver nas ruas escuras do Brooklyn em 1962. Escravo do poder das gangues e do vcio da herona, ele deve encontrar a f.

programme.title: Alm do Trofu, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: A histria da obsesso dos homens pelo poder e at onde eles iro s vezes reivindicar o "Prmio".

programme.title: A Fivela de Abner Outlaw, (2021, Thriller)
programme.desc: Durante uma terrvel tempestade, um serial killer causa estragos dentro de uma priso do Texas.

programme.title: Apenas Por Uma Noite, (2016, Drama)
programme.desc: O marido de uma mulher casada e com uma vida perfeita trai a irm, com consequncias extremas para todos.

programme.title: Desvio mortal, (1982, Action)
programme.desc: A auto-intitulada guerrilha urbana em Greenwich Village enviada em vrias misses em todo o pas por um misterioso comandante.

programme.title: Ruas Em Guerra, (2019, Action)
programme.desc: Quando o implacvel Lord Rincon e sua gangue MS-13 recrutam Miguel, de 10 anos, para trabalhar como um de seus entregadores de drogas, Lucas, irmo mais velho de Miguel e que tambm trabalha para o bandido, est desesperado para manter o garoto seguro.

programme.title: A Filha do General, (1999, Drama)
programme.desc: Dois investigadores do Exrcito revelam um escndalo multilateral quando provam o assassinato brutal de um oficial.

programme.title: Vice: A Mquina, (2015, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Julian Michaels um consagrado designer cuja obra maior Vice, um resort onde as pessoas podem fazer absolutamente tudo o que desejar, sem se ater a leis ou regras, j que apenas convive com robs travestidos de humanos.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Habilidades De Kakuzu
programme.desc: Shikamaru e choji do os primeiros golpes na batalha, mas esto contrariados com o poder de kakuzu.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Terrvel Segredo
programme.desc: Shikamaru e seus companheiros desesperadamente contra-atacam a ofensiva do jutsu de fogo. Mas usar continuamente rasengan e a espada relmpago causa desgaste em kakashi.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Gnio Shikamaru
programme.desc: Shikamaru enfrenta hidan sozinho, no fundo da floresta e aps gastar todo seu chakra, ele tem um ferimento profundo.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Quando Se Amaldioa Algum, Cava-Se O Prprio Tmulo!
programme.desc: Naruto e a equipe kakashi chegam na hora certa para ajudar a equipe asuma. Sakura e sai receberam ordens de kakashi para ajudar shikamaru, que est lutando sozinho
programme.sub-title: Quando Se Amaldioa Algum, Cava-Se O Prprio Tmulo!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Estilo Vento: Rasen Shuriken!
programme.desc: Ino e choji ficam pasmos com novo jutsu de naruto, e kakuzu sente o perigo se aproximando. Mas ao lan-lo, o novo jutsu se dissipa antes de atingir kakuzu.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Preo Do Poder
programme.desc: Naruto usa seu novo jutsu para derrotar kakuzu. Tsunade d boas-vindas na volta das equipes ao lar e manda que as equipes asuma e yamato faam uma pausa

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Determinao Do Shinobi
programme.desc: Justo quando a paz finalmente chega aldeia, surge uma informao de que o esconderijo de orochimaru foi encontrado

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Esconderijo Do Orochimaru Descoberto!
programme.desc: Naruto e jiraiya chegam s fontes termais. Como uma alternativa ao estilo vento: rasen shuriken, jiraiya sugere a naruto a colaborao de um ninjutsu com um sapo ninja.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Encontro
programme.desc: No esconderijo de orochimaru guren testemunha sasuke derrotando mil oponentes. Tendo perdido a oportunidade para ser nova hospedeira de orochimaru no passado, guren abertamente expressa seu cime em relao a sasuke

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Conectando Coraes
programme.desc: Acreditando que o novo jutsu do naruto est quase pronto, jiraiya vai investigar novas informaes sobre as aes da akatsuki

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Uma Noite Chuvosa
programme.desc: Atrs do esconderijo, rinji e gozu descobrem que um shinobi seguiu seus passos. Kakashi e sua equipe notam que o inimigo est usando um morcego para vigilncia

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Os Dois Amuletos
programme.desc: Na aldeia da folha naruto est ocupado treinando com gamakichi e gamatatsu.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Inimigo Invisvel
programme.desc: A equipe yamato segue para dar reforo equipe kakashi. Bem antes de sua partida naruto recebe uma dica para aperfeioar seu novo jutsu entrando na barriga de gamatatsu

programme.desc: Stan e Kyle se tornam prisioneiros do Pentgono at contarem exatamente como chegaram Terra da Imaginao. Cartman no desistir da aposta e quer que Kyle chupe suas bolas, conforme o combinado.

programme.title: Quando esto na Terra da Imaginao, Stan e Butters tem que lutar contra um exrcito de foras imaginrias do mal. A Suprema Corte declara que as criaturas imaginrias no so reais e planeja destruir a Terra da Imaginao.
programme.desc: Quando esto na Terra da Imaginao, Stan e Butters tem que lutar contra um exrcito de foras imaginrias do mal. A Suprema Corte declara que as criaturas imaginrias no so reais e planeja destruir a Terra da Imaginao.

programme.title: The Caddy, (1953, Comedy)
programme.desc: In this zany farce, Harvey is a shy but talented pro golfer who, because he can't face the crowds, coaxes his buddy Joe into a big-time tournament. As Joe's caddy, Harvey is a disaster, and the two have a hilarious quarrel.

programme.title: Scared Stiff, (1953, Comedy)
programme.desc: Fleeing from a murder charge, Dean Martin and Jerry Lewis find gangsters and ghosts on a spooky Caribbean island inherited by an heiress.

programme.title: Artists and Models, (1955, Comedy)
programme.desc: A goonish young man receives telepathic top secret information in his nightmares, which are used by his artist friend in comic strips. Foreign agents and the CIA get interested.

programme.title: Pardners, (1956, Comedy)
programme.desc: A rich momma's boy returns west with the son of his murdered father's partner to foil a gang trying to gain control of his family ranch. They accidentally clean up the town.

programme.title: Hollywood Or Bust, (1956, Comedy)
programme.desc: A movie-mad nitwit driving across the country to his mecca, Hollywood, is joined by a gambler who wants to break into singing when they pick up a pretty girl en route. Once in Hollywood, the nitwit meets his dream goddess.

programme.title: It's A Mad, Mad, Mad, Mad World, (1963, Comedy)
programme.desc: Spencer Tracy leads a hilariously zany cast of Hollywood's greatest comedians (including Milton Berle, Sid Caesar, Ethel Merman and Mickey Rooney) as eight vacation-bound motorists set off on a mad-cap, side-splitting race to find a stolen fortune!

programme.title: Chitty Chitty Bang Bang, (1968, Musical)
programme.desc: A weird inventor, Caractacus Potts, invents an amazing flying car, which drives by itself. It takes him and his Family to Vulgaria, where the sinister buffoon Baron Bomburst kidnaps the car.

programme.title: Houseboat, (1958, Comedy)
programme.desc: This Oscar-nominated film has the legendary Cary Grant as a government attorney who can't seem to shake his bad fortune. Living on a houseboat, widowed and left with three unruly kids, he hires Sophia Loren as a governess.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible III, (2006, Action)
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt hurdles into spectacular new adventures from Rome to Shanghai as he races to rescue a captured agent and stop Davian from eliminating his next target, Ethans wife.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Ghost Protocol, (2011, Action)
programme.desc: Agent Ethan Hunt and his elite team go underground after a bombing implicates them as terrorists. While trying to clear their name, the team uncovers a plot to start a nuclear war.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Rogue Nation, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Ethan and team take on their most impossible mission yet, eradicating the Syndicate - an International rogue organization as highly skilled as they are, committed to destroying the IMF.

programme.title: Jack Reacher, (2012, Action)
programme.desc: Investigator Jack Reacher leaps off the pages of Lee Child's novel and onto the big screen in this thriller. When a horrible crime is committed, all evidence points to the suspect in custody, who offers up a single note in defense: "Get Jack Reacher!"

programme.title: Gladiator, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: A man robbed of his name and his dignity strives to win them back, and gain the freedom of his people, in this epic historical drama from director Ridley Scott.

programme.title: Jack Reacher, (2012, Action)
programme.desc: Investigator Jack Reacher leaps off the pages of Lee Child's novel and onto the big screen in this thriller. When a horrible crime is committed, all evidence points to the suspect in custody, who offers up a single note in defense: "Get Jack Reacher!"

programme.desc: Two crew members wake up on an abandoned spacecraft without knowing who they are, how long they've been asleep, or their mission. Soon after, they discover they're not alone, and the situation is more horrifying than they ever could have imagined.

programme.title: Escape Room, (2017, Horror)
programme.desc: For a birthday celebration, three couples partake in an ESCAPE ROOM, in which they must work together to solve puzzles in order to escape the roombut when the game turns deadly, they quickly learn the only winners are the survivors.

programme.title: Jessabelle, (2014, Horror)
programme.desc: A girl comes face to face with a long-tormented spirit that has been seeking her return.

programme.title: Vivarium, (2020, Thriller)

programme.title: The Wood, (1999, Romance)

programme.title: Purple Rain, (1983, Musical)
programme.desc: Headstrong, vulnerable young musician The Kid (Prince) struggles with his own inner demons and with his alcoholic father who beats his mother. But the madness infects his music, fueling a sound that transforms the struggling, young rocker into a star.

programme.title: Dope, (2015, Comedy)
programme.desc: A chance encounter with a drug dealer throws the lives of three nerdy teens in Inglewood, CA into chaos in this coming-of-age adventure.

programme.desc: Lots of guys have second thoughts about marriage. Three hours before his wedding, Roland is having third, fourth and fifth thoughts. Good thing hes got buddies Slim and Mike around to help.

programme.title: Double Impact, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: Identical twins are separated at six months and raised on different continents. They reunite twenty-five years later to avenge the murder of their parents and reclaim their stolen family fortune.

programme.title: Timecop, (1994, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Max Walker, an officer for a security agency that regulates time travel, must fend for his life against a shady politician who's intent on changing the past to control the future.

programme.title: Universal Soldier, (1992, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A woman reporter discovers a Defense Department project to create androids from the bodies of Vietnam soldiers, to be then used as an elite anti-terrorism unit.

programme.title: Universal Soldier: The Return, (1999, Science fiction)
programme.desc: The "universal soldiers" must fight the whole army, when the military's supercomputer S.E.T.H gets out of control.

programme.title: Double Team, (1997, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Action superstar Jean-Claude Van Damme joins forces with NBA and media sensation Dennis Rodman in this action-packed thriller. Top counter-terrorist Jack Quinn is ready to get out of the spy game until the evil Stavros kidnaps his wife and unborn son.

programme.title: Bloodsport, (1988, Action)
programme.desc: Ninjitsu master Frank Dux journeys to Hong Kong to enter the Kumite, the Olympics of martial arts, and meets a beautiful American reporter. Before long he must face Chong-Li, a vicious Korean master of Tae Kwan Do, in a climactic fight to the finish.

programme.title: The Big Boss, (1971, Action)
programme.desc: Bruce Lee faces an underground criminal element after members of his family begin disappearing. Now he must break his vow of non-violence to take on the terrifying "Big Boss."

programme.title: Fist Of Fury, (1972, Action)
programme.desc: Bruce Lee stars as Chen Zhen, a martial arts protg who returns to his former school in Shanghai when he learns that his beloved instructor has been murdered. To avenge his master's death, Chen must fight the greatest assassins from a rival school.

programme.title: Instant Family, (2018, Drama)
programme.desc: A couple find themselves in over their heads when they foster three children

programme.title: Obvious Child, (2014, Comedy)
programme.desc: A one night stand leaves a woman (Jenny Slate) with an unexpected surprise just in time for Valentine's Day in this hilarious and heartwarming romantic comedy that has critics audiences raving.

programme.title: Playing with Fire, (2019, Comedy)
programme.desc: When firefighter Jake Carson (John Cena) and his team (Keegan-Michael Key & John Leguizamo) rescue three siblings in the path of a wildfire, they realize no amount of training could have prepared them for their most challenging job yet -- babysitting.

programme.title: Instant Family, (2018, Drama)

programme.title: Caddyshack, (1980, Comedy)
programme.desc: It's the snobs against the slobs! While caddy Danny tries to impress elitist Judge Smails, a crude construction tycoon tries getting accepted at the country club, and a groundskeeper stalks a gopher.

programme.title: Instant Family, (2018, Drama)
programme.desc: A couple find themselves in over their heads when they foster three children

programme.title: At First Sight, (1999, Romance)
programme.desc: AT FIRST SIGHT is the story of a young woman architect who falls in love with a blind man. She encourages him to undergo a radical operation to restore his sight, but ultimately his truest vision comes from the love he finds in his heart.

programme.title: Angel Eyes, (2001, Romance)
programme.desc: After meeting under extraordinary life-and-death circumstances, a Chicago police officer (Lopez) and a lost soul named Catch (Caviezel) fall in love. While uncovering the truth about Catch, she is forced to deal with the secrets of her own past. Rated-R

programme.title: House of Flying Daggers, (2004, Action)
programme.desc: Mei is an exotic, beautiful blind dancer, associated with a dangerous revolutionary gang, known as the House of Flying Daggers. Captured by officers of the decadent Tang Dynasty, Mei finds herself both threatened. Rated: PG-13

programme.title: The Mortal Instruments, (2013, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Clary's life is turned upside down when her mother is kidnapped and it's revealed that they are shadowhunters who are tasked with protecting the world from vampires, werewolves and demons. Clary must discover her talents and save her mother.

programme.title: Julie & Julia, (2009, Drama)
programme.desc: Julie & Julia, tells the true stories of how Julia Child's life and cookbook inspired fledgling writer Julie Powell to whip up 524 recipes in 365 days and introduce a new generation to the magic of French cooking.

programme.title: My Best Friend's Wedding, (1997, Romance)
programme.desc: Commitment-shy Jules Potter reluctantly realizes she is in love with her best friend Michael. There is just one catch: he's about to marry someone else. Jules will do anything to steal him back... except tell him the simple truth.

programme.title: The Romantics, (2010, Comedy)
programme.desc: Over the course of one raucous night at a seaside wedding, seven close friendsall members of an eclectic college cliqueassemble to watch two of their own tie the knot.

programme.title: Shooter, (2007, Action)
programme.desc: Determined to prove his innocence in a double-cross, Bob Lee Swagger is now in a high-tension race from every law enforcement agency in the US and a shadowy organization that wants him dead.

programme.title: Patriot Games, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: Jack Ryan is caught in the middle of a terrorist attack. Ryan helps to thwart Holmes assailants and becomes a local hero. But Ryans act marks him as a target. Now he must return to action to save his family.

programme.title: Open Water, (2003, Horror)
programme.desc: When a couple is stranded while scuba diving, they soon realize they are in the middle of shark-infested waters in this intense, critically acclaimed thriller.

programme.title: Open Water 2, (2005, Horror)
programme.desc: A weekend cruise on a luxurious party yacht goes horribly wrong for a group of old high-school friends.

programme.title: Open Water 3: Cage Dive, (2017, Thriller)
programme.desc: When three friends from California hit the rugged Australian coast, a rogue wave destroys their boat, leaving them afloat and defenseless in shark-infested waters.

programme.title: Patriot Games, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: Jack Ryan is caught in the middle of a terrorist attack. Ryan helps to thwart Holmes assailants and becomes a local hero. But Ryans act marks him as a target. Now he must return to action to save his family.

programme.title: Jawbreaker, (1999, Comedy)
programme.desc: "The beautiful ones. The flawless four. Everyone wanted to be them. You know 'em". First there's Courtney "Satan-in-heels" Shayne and her pawn, the dense but dangerous Marcie Fox, a legend in her own little mind. Rated: R

programme.title: Single White Female, (1992, Thriller)
programme.desc: SWF seeks female to share apt in West 70s. Non-smoker, professional preferred. An innocent want ad opens the door to murderous, unrelenting terror in this pulse-pounding psychological shocker starring Bridget Fonda and Jennifer Jason Leigh. Rated: R

programme.title: Amistad, (1997, Educational)
programme.desc: AMISTAD is about a 1839 mutiny onboard a slave ship that is traveling towards the Northeast Coast of America. Much of the story involves a court-room drama about the slave who led the revolt.

programme.title: Waves, (2019, Drama)
programme.desc: Waves traces the epic emotional journey of a suburban African-American family as they navigate love, forgiveness, & coming together after a lossa heartrending story about the universal capacity for compassion & growth even in dark times.

programme.title: Only the Brave, (2017, Drama)
programme.desc: Only the Brave, based on the true story of the Granite Mountain Hotshots, is the heroic story of a team of local firefighters who through hope, determination, and sacrifice become one of the most elite firefighting teams in the nation.

programme.title: Saving Face, (2005, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: A Chinese-American lesbian and her traditionalist mother are reluctant to go public with secret loves that clash against cultural expectations.

programme.title: Stonewall, (2015, Drama)
programme.desc: Passions and politics make a volatile mix in this dynamic drama directed by Roland Emmerich that follows the events that led to the birth of the modern Gay Rights movement.

programme.title: Freeheld, (2015, Romance)
programme.desc: Julianne Moore and Ellen Page star in this stirring real-life inspirational story of a detective and her domestic partner who battled the legal system for equal rights.

programme.title: A Single Man, (2009, Drama)
programme.desc: A day in the life of a college professor; recently widowed after a sixteen-year marriage.

programme.title: Blackthorn, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: Sam Shepard is Butch Cassidy in this thrilling western about the legendary outlaw's return from exile. After years of quiet, he embarks on his greatest adventure since his glory days with the Sundance Kid.

programme.title: Meek's Cutoff, (2011, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: Settlers traveling through the Oregon desert in 1845 find themselves stranded in harsh conditions.

programme.title: The Claim, (2017, Romance)
programme.desc: THE CLAIM is an epic story of love, passion and redemption set against the winter landscape of the Sierra Nevada Mountains and the making of California. Dillon is a pioneer who defied the harsh winter in search of rumored gold.

programme.title: Wild Bill, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: Wild Bill focuses on the last days of gunfighter, Wild Bill Hickok, consorting in Deadwood with Calamity Jane, observed by a longtime friend, and haunted by the ghosts of his past, from an old flame to a young man who announces his intention to kill Bill.

programme.title: Jane Got a Gun, (2015, Western)
programme.desc: A woman asks her ex-lover for help in order to save her outlaw husband from a gang out to kill him.

programme.title: American Outlaws, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: When a Midwest town learns that a corrupt railroad baron has captured the deeds to their homesteads without their knowledge, young ranchers join forces to take back what is rightfully theirs.

programme.title: The Salvation, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: The mighty Mads Mikkelsen unleashes a maelstrom of bloodshed in the Wild West in this white-knuckle tale of revenge, co-starring Eva Green.

programme.title: Bone Tomahawk, (2015, Thriller)
programme.desc: When a group of cannibal savages kidnaps settlers from the small town of Bright Hope, an unlikely team of gunslingers, led by Sheriff Hunt (Kurt Russell), sets out to bring them home.

programme.title: The Island, (2005, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A man goes on the run after he discovers that he is actually a "harvested being", and is being kept along with others in a utopian facility.

programme.title: Come Away, (2020, Science fiction)
programme.desc: When their eldest brother dies, Peter and Alice seek to save their parents from despair until they are forced to choose between home and imagination, setting the stage for their iconic journeys into Wonderland and Neverland.

programme.title: Tomb Raider, (2018, Adventure)
programme.desc: Armed with only her sharp mind, blind faith and stubborn spirit, young Lara Croft pushes past her limits on her very first perilous adventure into the unknown. If she survives, it could be the making of herearning her the name tomb raider.

programme.title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: Exploring lost empires and finding priceless treasures... it's all in a day's work for Lara Croft. Though, a secret from her father's past is about to lead Lara to her greatest challenge.

programme.title: Lara Croft Tomb Raider: The Cradle of Life, (2003, Adventure)
programme.desc: Lara Croft sets out on a quest to save Pandora's box from landing into the wrong hands. Join her as she races through furious hand-to-hand battles, blazing shoot-outs and breathtaking sky-diving escapes to try to save the ancient artifact.

programme.title: Transformers, (2007, Science fiction)
programme.desc: From director Michael Bay and executive producer Steven Spielberg comes a thrilling battle between the heroic Autobots and the evil Decepticons. When their epic struggle comes to Earth, Sam Witwicky becomes mankind's last chance for survival.

programme.title: Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: The battle for Earth continues when college-bound Sam Witwicky learns the truth about the ancient origins of the Transformers and must join in their continued battle against the Decepticons.

programme.title: Four Brothers, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: After their adoptive mother is murdered during a grocery store hold-up, the Mercer bros reunite to take the matter into their own hands. As they track down the killer, they quickly realize that their old ways of doing business have new consequences.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible, (1996, Action)
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt, a secret agent, is framed for the deaths of his espionage team and attempts to flee government assassins after him. He races against the clock in order to discover the truth.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible II, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: The world's greatest spy, Ethan Hunt, returns and partners up with the beautiful Nyah Hall to stop renegade agent Sean Ambrose from releasing a new kind of terror on an unsuspecting world.

programme.desc: Ethan Hunt hurdles into spectacular new adventures from Rome to Shanghai as he races to rescue a captured agent and stop Davian from eliminating his next target, Ethans wife.

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part II, (1981, Horror)
programme.desc: Five years after the bloodbath at Camp Crystal, all that remains is the legend of Jason and his demented mother, who had murdered seven camp counsellors. At a nearby summer camp, the new counsellors are unconcerned about the warnings to stay away.

programme.desc: Ignoring Camp Crystal Lakes bloody legacy, one by one they fall victim to the maniacal Jason who stalks them at every turn...

programme.desc: After his revival in a hospital morgue, the hockey-masked murderer fixes his vengeful attention on the Jarvis family and a group of hitherto carefree teenagers.

programme.title: Friday the 13th, (1980, Horror)
programme.desc: Camp Crystal Lake has been shuttered for over 20 years due to several vicious and unsolved murders. The camp's new owner and seven young counselors are readying the property for re-opening despite warnings of a "death curse" by local residents.

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part II, (1981, Horror)
programme.desc: Five years after the bloodbath at Camp Crystal, all that remains is the legend of Jason and his demented mother, who had murdered seven camp counsellors. At a nearby summer camp, the new counsellors are unconcerned about the warnings to stay away.

programme.desc: After his revival in a hospital morgue, the hockey-masked murderer fixes his vengeful attention on the Jarvis family and a group of hitherto carefree teenagers.

programme.title: An America Werewolf In London, (1981, Horror)
programme.desc: David Kessler and Jack Goodman arrive in Northern England for a walking tour. One night, a beast attacks them, killing Jack. Weeks later Jack returns to warn David that a werewolf was their assailant and that he is now the last of the werewolves!

programme.title: Stephen King's Silver Bullet, (1985, Horror)

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The origins of the Millennium Items are revealed! Who forged these powerful artifacts, and why were they created? Though the Millennium Items are powerful, such power comes with a heavy price... a debt that may never be able to be repaid!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh calls forth the mighty Egyptian God Slifer the Sky Dragon to fight the bandit Bakura's Diabound, but when Diabound starts attacking the townspeople, the Pharaoh must protect them, even if it means sacrificing himself!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The bandit Bakura has stolen the Millennium Puzzle and sent the Pharaoh plummeting into the abyss. Now he's another step closer to obtaining all seven Millennium Items and resurrecting the malevolent Zorc, the greatest evil of all time!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and the Pharaoh are reunited, but the Pharaoh is powerless without the Millennium Puzzle! However, that won't stop the Pharaoh from a final showdown against the bandit king Bakura.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the showdown in the sands between the bandit Bakura and his ever-growing Diabound versus the Pharaoh, Mahad the Dark Magician, and the remaining guardians of the Pharaoh!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With the help of his father's spirit, the Pharaoh and his guardians defeated the bandit Bakura's Diabound and stopped the horrible Zorc from resurrecting... or did they?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh's journey was more than a trip to the past, it's the greatest Shadow Game ever created. Yami Yugi and Yami Bakura's Shadow Game has already reached apocalyptic proportions, but it's only the beginning of cataclysmic events!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Zorc's incredible shadow energies have resurrected the bandit Bakura and his Diabound. With a second chance at revenge, the bandit king has broken up the Pharaoh's team so that he can divide and conquer them one at a time!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After a nearly eternal slumber, the all-powerful Zorc has resurrected, plunging the world into darkness!

programme.desc: The Pharaoh and his guardians are down to their last line of defense as Shada falls victim to Zorc. The Pharaoh desperately wants to summon the three Egyptian Gods, but he can't without his Millennium Puzzle!
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part II

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Exodia the Forbidden One couldn't defeat Zorc! Exodia was able to buy enough time for the Pharaoh to get his Millennium Puzzle back-he can now summon the almighty Egyptian Gods! It's time for the Pharaoh's counterattack in the biggest brawl.
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part III

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The three Egyptian Gods have been defeated. The Pharaoh is severely hurt and unable to stop Zorc from setting fire to the city, but our heroes aren't giving up. It's not double vision when Seto and Kaiba transcend time to confront Zorc.
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part IV

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh and Kaiba's combined strength couldn't defeat Zorc. Yugi must give the Pharaoh his name, but Yugi doesn't know how to read ancient Egyptian text. All bets are off in the final clash where Yugi must protect the past to save the future!
programme.sub-title: In the Name of the Pharaoh

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: If Yugi defeats Atem, Yugi will prove he's ready to stand on his own, and Atem can join his friends in the world beyond. But Yugi and Atem will be separated forever.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.desc: Atem still has all three Egyptian God Cards, Yugi doesn't have a single monster on the field! Yugi claims that he has a combo that will defeat the Egyptian Gods, but is he simply bragging, or does he actually have a plan?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Atem - more than friends, closer than brothers. Will they stay together, or is it time to say goodbye? It's the final answer, the final duel, and the final time we will see our friends in the rousing conclusion to Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.desc: After Yugi defeats Weevil's first wave of Duel Monsters, he's shocked to discover that Weevil has one last trick up his sleeve; a ravenous Great Moth that grows in power with every turn!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey finds himself courageously accepting a challenge from veteran duelist, Mai. But when Mai begins to demonstrate an unnerving psychic ability, Joey has to figure out Mai's secret strategy before falling victim to it!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The fisherman duelist baits Yugi into a duel on his own sea playing field for a home-field advantage. Can Yugi adapt to these new settings to turn the tide of battle?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: If Yugi is eliminated from the tournament, KaibaCorp's crooked Board of Directors will transfer control of the company from Kaiba to Pegasus! Kaiba's brother Mokuba challenges Yugi to a duel to protect his brother's company!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi must duel a magical doppelganger of Kaiba, created from the greed and power lust Yugi wiped from Kaiba's soul.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi defeats the Blue Eyes White Dragon, but there are two more waiting in the wings! Will the real Kaiba reach Yugi in time to help beat this impersonator?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey decides to battle Rex Raptor without his friends' help to prove that he is man enough to take care of Serenity on his own.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey duels valiantly, but Rex Raptor has unleashed his secret weapon: the Red-Eyes Black Dragon!

programme.title: Luffy hurries to free Law, but with their pirate alliance dissolved, will Law still see Luffy as an ally? Meanwhile, Usopp has convinced his newfound followers to destroy the factory! Doflamingo's defeat has thrown Dressrosa into chaos.
programme.desc: Luffy hurries to free Law, but with their pirate alliance dissolved, will Law still see Luffy as an ally? Meanwhile, Usopp has convinced his newfound followers to destroy the factory! Doflamingo's defeat has thrown Dressrosa into chaos.

programme.title: The mystery of Doflamingo's return from the dead is revealed! But there isn't much time to ponder how it happened, as his plan to silence the country of Dressrosa unfolds, spelling doom for the Straw Hats!
programme.desc: The mystery of Doflamingo's return from the dead is revealed! But there isn't much time to ponder how it happened, as his plan to silence the country of Dressrosa unfolds, spelling doom for the Straw Hats!

programme.title: As the people of Dressrosa see their friends and loved ones slaughter each other under the manipulation of Doflamingo, memories of 10 years ago rush back, and the truth of that event becomes clear. Doflamingo announces the rules for his deadly game.

programme.title: Doflamingo and Fujitora's agreement to not engage each other lasts for the moment - meaning all eyes are turned towards taking down the Straw Hats and claiming the rewards! And as Luffy starts heading to the Royal Palace, Fujitora stands in his way!
programme.desc: Doflamingo and Fujitora's agreement to not engage each other lasts for the moment - meaning all eyes are turned towards taking down the Straw Hats and claiming the rewards! And as Luffy starts heading to the Royal Palace, Fujitora stands in his way!

programme.title: Robin, Usopp, the Tontattas and the others make moves to rejoin Luffy as Doflamingo's deadly game rages on! Meanwhile, Kin'emon makes it to the trash heap in his search for his friend Kanjuro - just as Pica emerges in the town.
programme.desc: Robin, Usopp, the Tontattas and the others make moves to rejoin Luffy as Doflamingo's deadly game rages on! Meanwhile, Kin'emon makes it to the trash heap in his search for his friend Kanjuro - just as Pica emerges in the town.
programme.sub-title: With a Rumbling of the Ground! The God of Destruction - Giant Pica Descends!

programme.title: With Luffy & the others recovering from Pica's attack, the game is afoot! Luffy has just enough time to regroup and set out to find Doflamingo, only to find that the dastardly Warlord has more enemies than he might realize! A strange argument breaks out.
programme.desc: With Luffy & the others recovering from Pica's attack, the game is afoot! Luffy has just enough time to regroup and set out to find Doflamingo, only to find that the dastardly Warlord has more enemies than he might realize! A strange argument breaks out.

programme.title: Don Chin Jao and Elizabello successfully break Pica's giant arm but the rock giant is unfazed and starts throwing even more destructive punches at Luffy and his band of unwanted collaborators! Meanwhile, Navy Admiral Fujitora moves into action.

programme.desc: Penned in at the bottom of a well, Luffy and Law are caught in a trap! But someone has come to save them who they least expect! Meanwhile, the Tontattas help Franky break in to the SMILE factory, and Bartolomeo resorts to tactics he used in the Colosseum.

programme.desc: Things grow stranger for Law as he learns the secret behind why Corazon feigns being mute! But the mysterious Corazon's actions are only beginning to baffle Law as he takes him on a journey to cure his White Lead Disease.

programme.title: Corazon's double-dealing with the Navy raises suspicions both with Doflamingo and Law. But all that is secondary as Corazon finally has a chance to grab the Op-Op Fruit during a staged handoff arranged by the Government.

programme.desc: Violet runs down the status of the open battles raging in Dressrosa - the Straw Hats, the Tontattas, the executives of the Doflamingo Family - all of them clash around the island, but it's Law's revelation to Doflamingo that moves the action forward!

programme.title: Luffy continues to battle Fake-mingo, but keeps accidentally battling Bellamy instead. Meanwhile the tide of battle turns against Law as painful scars from the past resurface. And Zoro gets unexpected help in his battle with Pica.

programme.title: Bellamy escapes Doflamingo's control, but it might be too late. His long history with Doflamingo unfolds and leads to an inglorious end. Meanwhile, Hajrudin has been beaten down, but a fire still burns in him to pay back the favor he owes!
programme.desc: Bellamy escapes Doflamingo's control, but it might be too late. His long history with Doflamingo unfolds and leads to an inglorious end. Meanwhile, Hajrudin has been beaten down, but a fire still burns in him to pay back the favor he owes!
programme.sub-title: A Decisive Battle Against the Executives! Proud Hajrudin!

programme.title: Lao G and Don Chinjao duke it out as each brings their most devastating attacks to the battle. But a misunderstanding caused by Baby 5 has Sai and Don Chinjao distracted - are they distracted enough for Lao G to gain the upper hand?
programme.desc: Lao G and Don Chinjao duke it out as each brings their most devastating attacks to the battle. But a misunderstanding caused by Baby 5 has Sai and Don Chinjao distracted - are they distracted enough for Lao G to gain the upper hand?

programme.title: Law is at the whim of Doflamingo and Trebol, while Luffy still has to deal with Bellamy, who fights to keep his honor even after being released by Doflamingo! Meanwhile, Gladius is about to detonate the ground around Cavendish and Bartolomeo!
programme.desc: Law is at the whim of Doflamingo and Trebol, while Luffy still has to deal with Bellamy, who fights to keep his honor even after being released by Doflamingo! Meanwhile, Gladius is about to detonate the ground around Cavendish and Bartolomeo!
programme.sub-title: The Man's Pride! Bellamy's Last Charge!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Bye Bye, Lady Liberty
programme.desc: Foiled repeatedly by the predictions of Interpol's supercomputer, professional looter Lupin III has settled down. A sinister secret organization and a young computer genius are thrown into the mix. And whose side is the buxom Fujiko on this time?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Hemingway Papers
programme.desc: The legendary last manuscript of the great Ernest Hemingway tells of a buried treasure on an island far away and thief extraordinaire Lupin is on the trail! But he gets caught up in a local civil war, Lupin will have to keep his wits or risk his life!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Napoleon's Dictionary
programme.desc: Lupin learns of his grandfather's secret treasure, supposedly hidden in the pages of a dictionary previously owned by Napoleon Bonaparte! Said dictionary just happens to be the prize in a cross-country classic car race.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: From Siberia With Love
programme.desc: Ultimate thief Lupin III has a new target: the lost gold of the Romanov dynasty! With the help of a mysterious blonde named Judy Scott, Lupin discovers the treasure hidden in Texas, at the Bank of Liberty.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: It's been a long time since Jigen, Goemon and Fujiko have heard from Lupin. Then one day, they each receive an invitation from Lupin for a reunion aboard the luxury liner Sirloin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: An international soccer game is taking place in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil and Lupin has his eyes on the box office and betting takes. Will the box office heist go as planned?
programme.sub-title: Wads of Bills Blossomed in the Sunset of Rio

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: An old man who supposedly knows the secret to Hitler's legacy lives in East Germany within the Berlin Wall. Lupin and his gang track the old man down, but the old man can't recall anything about any legacy.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: At Loch Ness in Scotland, the mysterious monster Nessie reveals itself from the lake, charmed by Fujiko's singing. Seeing this, Doctor Oz decides to use Fujiko to capture Nessie for his personal gain.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko and a mystery man have an enticing job for Lupin: Stealing a ton of gold bullion from a Swiss Bank, a bank renowned for its tight security. Can it be done? What is the mystery man's true identity?
programme.sub-title: I'll Teach You How to Transport Gold Bars

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A man is threatening to destroy the Leaning Tower of Pisa with a device that generates artificial earthquakes. The Italian government has no choice but to meet the culprit's, but Lupin takes the ransom for himself!
programme.sub-title: Will the Leaving Tower of Pisa Be Standing?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin has stolen the golden death mask of Tutankhamen, the ancient Egyptian pharaoh known as the "boy king." However, when Lupin tries on the golden death mask he becomes possessed by an ominous curse.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The Trans Europe Superexpress train has departed Venice and is headed to France. Onboard the Superexpress is crime boss Don Marcino's ill-gotten treasures. Can Lupin and his gang pull off the heist before the train reaches its destination?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin meets the grandson of master Ukiyoe artist, Toushusai Sharaku and learns that he has been switching his own works with his grandfather's originals. Unable to switch the last painting due to illness, he asks Lupin to switch it in his stead.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko have been invited to a party hosted by Marcel Dulane, a member of Paris' high society. However, the elegant party turns out to be a trap. Fujiko is taken hostage and Lupin, with a time-bomb belt strapped to his waist

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is in Monaco to race his new toy in the Monaco Grand Prix. Or so he thought. Lupin ends up losing both his money and race car in a fixed poker game at the casino.
programme.sub-title: Bet on the Monaco Grand Prix!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A rare bottle of Bordeaux, commissioned by Napoleon for his beloved wife, Josephine, is to be given to the President of the United States as a Christmas present.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A criminal gang has hidden a microfilm containing the manufacturing process for artificial diamonds, developed by NASA, in one of Inspector Zenigata's molars. Determined to get his hands on that microfilm, Lupin must capture Inspector Zenigata.
programme.sub-title: The Great Chase in San Francisco

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Forward Hees, the world's richest man, suddenly dies a mysterious death and leaves a large ruby to Fujiko in his will. After inheriting the ruby, Fujiko comes down with the same mysterious fever as Hees
programme.sub-title: Big Adventure of the Caribbean Sea

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A Count challenges Lupin to steal a gemstone named Dracula's Tear from on board his airship, the Hendenburg. However, also on board the ship are several formidable detectives: Homes III, Detective Archer, Koojisuke Kaneda and Inspector Zenigata.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is suffering from Transformation Sickness, an illness that transforms him into a cruel, cold-blooded criminal at the stroke of midnight, and leaves him with no recollection of his murderous crime spree in the morning

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A small Arab nation has received a blackmail notice. Pay a $100 million or have their oil fields blown up. Lupin targets the money, but his plans are hindered when he finds out the culprits are using human bombs.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The Black Panther, the world's largest emerald, gets its name from the black panther that appears inside it when a light shines on it at a particular angle. After capturing this one-of-a-kind emerald, Lupin hides it in a museum to retrieve it later

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Vault maker Marukin Safe Company is forced into bankruptcy after Lupin cracks open their impenetrable safes. To test his own skills, Marukin's son challenges Lupin to open a safe he has designed

programme.title: Double Team, (1997, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Action superstar Jean-Claude Van Damme joins forces with NBA and media sensation Dennis Rodman in this action-packed thriller. Top counter-terrorist Jack Quinn is ready to get out of the spy game until the evil Stavros kidnaps his wife and unborn son.

programme.title: Pompeii, (2014, Super Swashbucklers)
programme.desc: Set in 79 A.D., POMPEII tells the epic story of Milo, a slave turned invincible gladiator who finds himself in a race against time to save his true love, Cassia, the beautiful daughter of a wealthy merchant.

programme.title: 57 Seconds, (2024, Science fiction)
programme.desc: When a tech blogger lands an interview with a tech guru and stops an attack on him, he finds a mysterious ring that takes him back 57 seconds into the past.

programme.title: Interstellar, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: From director Christopher Nolan (Inception) comes the story of ex-pilot Cooper (Matthew McConaughey), who must leave his family and Earth behind to lead an expedition beyond this galaxy to discover whether mankind has a future among the stars.

programme.title: Attack the Block, (2011, Science fiction)
programme.desc: ATTACK THE BLOCK is a fast, funny, frightening action adventure movie that pits a teen street gang against an invasion of savage alien monsters. It turns a crazy mix of tough street kids into a team of kick ass heroes.

programme.title: The Fifth Element, (1997, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Bruce Willis, Milla Jovovich, and Gary Oldman star in acclaimed director Luc Besson's outrageous sci-fi adventure, an extravagantly styled tale of good against evil set in an unbelievable twenty-third century world.

programme.title: Interstellar, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: From director Christopher Nolan (Inception) comes the story of ex-pilot Cooper (Matthew McConaughey), who must leave his family and Earth behind to lead an expedition beyond this galaxy to discover whether mankind has a future among the stars.

programme.title: The Sons of Katie Elder, (1965, Drama)
programme.desc: The four rowdy sons of Katie Elder return home for her funeral and to avenge her death.

programme.title: Oklahoma Annie, (1952, Drama)
programme.desc: Woman gets involved in cleaning up corruption in her town in this raucous musical comedy.

programme.title: True Grit, (1969, Drama)
programme.desc: The cantankerous Rooster is hired by a headstrong young girl (Kim Darby) to find the man who murdered her father and fled with the family savings.

programme.title: Hondo, (1953, Drama)
programme.desc: John Wayne plays Hondo Lane, a cavalry rider who becomes the protector of Angie Lowe as well as a father figure to her boy, Johnny. Angie, determinedly awaiting the return of her husband, refuses to leave their homestead despite the growing danger.

programme.desc: The four rowdy sons of Katie Elder return home for her funeral and to avenge her death.

programme.title: True Grit, (1969, Drama)
programme.desc: The cantankerous Rooster is hired by a headstrong young girl (Kim Darby) to find the man who murdered her father and fled with the family savings.

programme.title: The Horse Soldiers, (1959, Western)
programme.desc: John Wayne, Constance Towers and William Holden star in this 1863, fact-based story about a Union mission to destroy a railroad junction deep within Confederate territory.

programme.title: Hondo, (1953, Drama)

programme.title: A Espada De Deus - A ltima Cruzada
programme.desc: Dois cavaleiros cristos chegam a uma ilha remota com a inteno de converter os aldees pagos sua religio. programme.title: A Saga Viking
programme.desc: Um grupo de cruis vikings vai Gr-Bretanha com a inteno de saquear. Mas os seus planos mudam quando enfrentam uma tempestade que os deixa nufragos na costa escocesa. Encalhados, aventuram-se at chegar a Danelaw, o distante acampamento viking.

programme.title: Operao Zodaco

programme.desc: O rei do Egito avisado da profecia de que Messias chegar. Para evitar que o inimigo sobreviva, ele ordena que matem todos os bebs do sexo masculino.

programme.title: O Cachorro que salvou o Vero
programme.desc: Quando o co Zeus destri uma importante festa da famlia Bannister, ele enviado para uma escola de treinamento. programme.title: A Maldio da Floresta
programme.desc: Adam e Clare se mudam para uma rea rural com seu filho recm-nascido. Eles logo comeam a receber avisos sobre espritos malignos na regio, mas a jovem famlia prefere apreciar a beleza da floresta.

programme.title: O Monstro Dentro de Voce

programme.title: Siembamba: A Cano Do Mal
programme.desc: O choro incessante do seu beb, sentimentos crescentes de culpa e paranoia levam Chloe a uma depresso sombria. Desorientada, ela visita o psiclogo, Dr. Timothy Reed, que diagnostica seus pensamentos e sentimentos como depresso ps-parto. O mundo ao seu redor implode e fica claro que ela e seu filho esto em perigo iminente. Mas de qu?

programme.title: Shark Season
programme.desc: Um grande tubaro branco persegue incansavelmente trs praticantes de caiaque em uma ilha remota. Enquanto esperam pela chegada de ajuda, a mar comea a subir, forando-os a voltar para as guas mortais. Agora a corrida comeou enquanto o tubaro ameaa abat-los no caminho de volta ao continente.

Seus colegas pedem ajuda para resgatar o rapaz, que pode morrer ou ficar gravemente ferido. Mas logo que o reforo chega, eles descobrem que esto cercados por minas e que qualquer movimento em falso pode ser fatal.

programme.desc: A tenso est insuportvel dentro do Assassinos Annimos, um grupo de apoio para matadores, quando todos esto tentando descobrir qual deles est por trs de um atentado contra um importante senador.

programme.desc: Una extraa coincidencia hace que dos bandas atraquen el mismo banco a la misma hora. Un peculiar cliente (Patrick Dempsey) y una resuelta cajera (Ashley Judd) pondrn en juego su ingenio y su valor para intentar frustrar el golpe.

programme.title: Blitz
programme.desc: Blitz um serial killer londrino que est matando policiais. O inspetor-chefe Roberts e o sargento Brant, um detetive de polcia duro, intransigente e politicamente incorreto, tm a tarefa de tentar deter o psicopata. Parece que Blitz comete os crimes para se tornar uma estrela dos tabloides - quanto mais ele mata, mais famoso se torna.

programme.desc: Histria do ex-motoqueiro e traficante Sam Childers, que tornou-se um grande lutador em defesa das crianas do Sudo, obrigadas a virar soldados muito antes de se tornarem homens. programme.desc: Jovem cujos pais se divorciaram encontra um mentor no veterano de guerra misantrpico que mora ao lado.

programme.desc: Adriana, uma escritora bem-sucedida, segue feliz em seu romance com Andr, que est prestes a lanar sua mais nova coleo de moda durante um cruzeiro pelo Caribe. programme.desc: Kathy uma escritora de sucesso. Quando ela volta, se lembra de sua vida antes de deixar a comunidade Amish.

programme.desc: Se os vinte anos so a poca da diverso, ento Jonah entende bem do assunto, at que ele recebe um diagnstico de que ficar infrtil em um ms. De repente, o garoto festeiro muda completamente suas prioridades. Ele tenta congelar o esperma, mas quando isso d errado, s restam trs semanas de fertilidade para Jonah.

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: Quando uma expedio desaparece no Congo, um grupo enviado para procura-la, em uma aventura cheia de acontecimentos, tecnologia e muito suspense.

programme.desc: Um criminoso se rene com um velho amigo aps uma troca de armas fracassada.

programme.desc: Dois agentes especiais precisam se unir contra um cartel de drogas mexicano depois que uma operao secreta acaba gerando resultados catastrficos.

programme.desc: Dois jovens americanos com habilidades especiais precisam correr para encontrar uma garota em Hong Kong antes que uma sombria organizao governamental chamada Division o faa.
